events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application to cover medical expenses for upcoming treatment.
The loan application was reviewed and categorized under personal loans due to reference to medical costs and personal expense.
A loan officer specialized in personal loans has been assigned to manage the applicant's file and assist with next steps.
Initial assessment of the application showed a clear purpose for the loan related to medical debt repayment and verified basic eligibility.
The applicant was asked to submit medical bills, proof of income, and identification as part of the document verification process.
Applicant provided all requested documents including detailed medical statements and recent pay stubs for review by the credit team.
Credit bureau reports were obtained and analyzed, revealing a solid credit history with no recent delinquencies or defaults.
Risk scoring indicates moderate risk due to existing debts, but loan purpose and income stability balance the overall profile.
A loan offer with favorable interest rates and terms was presented to the applicant, outlining repayment schedule over 24 months.
The applicant responded positively to the loan offer and confirmed willingness to proceed with the terms and conditions.
Following verification and applicant acceptance, the personal loan has been approved by the credit committee.
Loan amount has been disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account to assist with payment of medical expenses.
A follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant received funds and to offer assistance with repayment setup if needed.
The personal loan case has been successfully closed after funding and initial post-disbursement follow-up was completed.
